a1: I do not think that highly of Barcelona.
q2: Do you think highly of Barcelona?
a2: Yeah they are a great club, one of the best. They also have the greatest footballer of all time playing for them
q3: And who would that footballer be?
a3: I don't know any of the players on the Barcelona team.  Who do you think is the best player?
q4: Is Messi the greatest player in Barcelona?
a4: Messi is the greatest player in Barcelona, and the whole world. well, i think that.
q5: All players are good I think though
